author: gcolvin

author: timbeiko
content:
**ACDE recap**
- Devnet 8 launched, with some infra support (https://dencun-devnet-8.ethpandaops.io/): bugs were found in a few clients but many have already been fixed + other fixes are on the way: network is finalizing
- **EIP-4788**: we agreed to use a regular transaction to deploy the contract - we may revisit this if we feel that it was a bad decision, but it was the quickest option for now and seems ~half of people were in favor of it
- Holesky: we agreed to launch the testnet with 1.6B ETH supply - ETA Sept 15!
- EIP/ERC split: we're moving forward with the split, and EIP editors are formalizing their governance process going forward. Expect a proper doc ðŸ”œ ! Will keep being discussed in EIPIP calls
- We agreed to renumber the EL fork spec files to prefix them with numbers to make the sequence clearer
- EIP-7212 was presented (secp256r1 precompile) - this may be an EIP that L2s adopt before L1!

author: ulerdogan
content:

Discussion: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-7212-precompiled-for-secp256r1-curve-support/14789?u=ulerdogan
